main event: A witness in Joliet, Illinois observed a bright light in the sky that appeared stationary, then began moving very rapidly before disappearing in October 1967.
interesting points: The object appeared as a bright light, compared in brightness to a bright star.
The object appeared to be stationary at first, then began moving very rapidly.
The color of the object was reported as white.
The object was in sight for approximately 5 minutes.
The witness stated the object first seemed to be moving, then disappeared.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
